# bunddev ![](reference/figures/bunddev_hexagon.png)

An R interface to German government and public sector APIs listed on
[bund.dev](https://bund.dev). **33 ready-to-use adapters** return tidy
tibbles for immediate use in dplyr/ggplot2 workflows.

## Three-layer architecture

| Layer            | What it does                                | Entry point                                                                                                                                                                 |
|------------------|---------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Registry**     | Browse and search all APIs on bund.dev      | [`bunddev_list()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_list.md), [`bunddev_info()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_info.md)                          |
| **OpenAPI core** | Explore specs and call any endpoint         | [`bunddev_spec()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_spec.md), [`bunddev_call()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_call.md)                          |
| **Adapters**     | Ready-made functions returning tidy tibbles | e.g.Â [`smard_timeseries()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/smard_timeseries.md), [`autobahn_roadworks()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/autobahn_roadworks.md) |

Adapters include built-in response caching and rate limiting.

## Installation

Install the released version from CRAN:

``` r
install.packages("bunddev")
```

Or install the development version from GitHub:

``` r
remotes::install_github("mchlbckr/bunddev")
```

## Quick start

``` r
library(bunddev)

# Energy market data
series <- smard_timeseries(410, region = "DE", resolution = "hour")

# Weather warnings
dwd_warnings()

# Current news
tagesschau_homepage()

# Company search
handelsregister_search("deutsche bahn")

# Water levels
pegel_online_stations()

# Parliamentary documents
dip_bundestag_drucksache_list()
```

## Available adapters (33)

ðŸ›ï¸ **Government & Parliament** â€” bundestag, bundesrat,
bundestag_lobbyregister, dip_bundestag, bundeshaushalt

ðŸŒ¤ï¸ **Environment & Weather** â€” dwd, luftqualitaet, hochwasserzentralen,
pegel_online, mudab, smard

ðŸ“Š **Statistics & Data** â€” destatis, deutschlandatlas, regionalatlas,
dashboard_deutschland

ðŸ’¼ **Jobs & Education** â€” jobsuche, ausbildungssuche, bewerberboerse

ðŸš— **Transport & Infrastructure** â€” autobahn, ladestationen, eco_visio

ðŸš¨ **Safety & Alerts** â€” nina, lebensmittelwarnung, travelwarning,
pflanzenschutzmittelzulassung

ðŸ¥ **Health** â€” diga, hilfsmittel

ðŸ“° **Culture & Media** â€” tagesschau, ddb

ðŸ¢ **Business** â€” handelsregister, marktstammdaten

ðŸ“… **Other** â€” abfallnavi, feiertage

## Examples

### Browse the registry

``` r
library(bunddev)

bunddev_list(tag = "energy")
#> # A tibble: 3 Ã— 8
#>   id              title        provider spec_url docs_url auth  rate_limit tags 
#>   <chr>           <chr>        <chr>    <chr>    <chr>    <chr> <chr>      <lis>
#> 1 ladestationen   Ladesaeulenâ€¦ Bundesnâ€¦ https:/â€¦ https:/â€¦ none  <NA>       <chr>
#> 2 marktstammdaten Marktdatensâ€¦ Bundesnâ€¦ https:/â€¦ https:/â€¦ none  <NA>       <chr>
#> 3 smard           SMARD API    Bundesnâ€¦ https:/â€¦ https:/â€¦ none  Mehr als â€¦ <chr>
```

### German public holidays

``` r
feiertage_list(2025)
#> # A tibble: 190 Ã— 5
#>    region holiday                   date       note          date_time          
#>    <chr>  <chr>                     <chr>      <chr>         <dttm>             
#>  1 BW     Neujahrstag               2025-01-01 ""            2025-01-01 00:00:00
#>  2 BW     Heilige Drei KÃ¶nige       2025-01-06 ""            2025-01-06 00:00:00
#>  3 BW     Karfreitag                2025-04-18 ""            2025-04-18 00:00:00
#>  4 BW     Ostermontag               2025-04-21 ""            2025-04-21 00:00:00
#>  5 BW     Tag der Arbeit            2025-05-01 ""            2025-05-01 00:00:00
#>  6 BW     Christi Himmelfahrt       2025-05-29 ""            2025-05-29 00:00:00
#>  7 BW     Pfingstmontag             2025-06-09 ""            2025-06-09 00:00:00
#>  8 BW     Fronleichnam              2025-06-19 ""            2025-06-19 00:00:00
#>  9 BW     Tag der Deutschen Einheit 2025-10-03 ""            2025-10-03 00:00:00
#> 10 BW     Reformationstag           2025-10-31 "GemÃ¤ÃŸ Â§ 4 Aâ€¦ 2025-10-31 00:00:00
#> # â„¹ 180 more rows
```

### Autobahn roadworks

``` r
roads <- autobahn_roads()
roads
#> # A tibble: 110 Ã— 1
#>    road_id
#>    <chr>  
#>  1 A1     
#>  2 A2     
#>  3 A3     
#>  4 A4     
#>  5 A5     
#>  6 A6     
#>  7 A7     
#>  8 A8     
#>  9 A9     
#> 10 A10    
#> # â„¹ 100 more rows

roadworks <- autobahn_roadworks(roads$road_id[[1]])
roadworks
#> # A tibble: 181 Ã— 18
#>    road_id identifier        title subtitle display_type icon  is_blocked future
#>    <chr>   <chr>             <chr> <chr>    <chr>        <chr> <lgl>      <lgl> 
#>  1 A1      2026-002514--vi-â€¦ A1 |â€¦ " Saarbâ€¦ ROADWORKS    123   FALSE      FALSE 
#>  2 A1      2026-004710--vi-â€¦ A1 |â€¦ " Trierâ€¦ SHORT_TERM_â€¦ warnâ€¦ FALSE      FALSE 
#>  3 A1      2024-004256--vi-â€¦ A1 |â€¦ " Saarbâ€¦ ROADWORKS    123   FALSE      FALSE 
#>  4 A1      2024-004156--vi-â€¦ A1 |â€¦ " Saarbâ€¦ ROADWORKS    123   FALSE      FALSE 
#>  5 A1      2024-038925--vi-â€¦ A1 |â€¦ " Saarbâ€¦ ROADWORKS    123   FALSE      FALSE 
#>  6 A1      2024-004156--vi-â€¦ A1 |â€¦ " Saarbâ€¦ ROADWORKS    123   FALSE      FALSE 
#>  7 A1      2024-038925--vi-â€¦ A1 |â€¦ " Saarbâ€¦ SHORT_TERM_â€¦ warnâ€¦ FALSE      FALSE 
#>  8 A1      2024-004156--vi-â€¦ A1 |â€¦ " KÃ¶ln/â€¦ ROADWORKS    123   FALSE      FALSE 
#>  9 A1      2024-004156--vi-â€¦ A1 |â€¦ " KÃ¶ln/â€¦ ROADWORKS    123   FALSE      FALSE 
#> 10 A1      2024-038925--vi-â€¦ A1 |â€¦ " KÃ¶ln/â€¦ ROADWORKS    123   FALSE      FALSE 
#> # â„¹ 171 more rows
#> # â„¹ 10 more variables: start_timestamp <chr>, start_time <list>, point <chr>,
#> #   extent <chr>, coordinate_lat <chr>, coordinate_long <chr>,
#> #   description <chr>, footer <chr>, route_recommendation <list>,
#> #   lorry_parking_feature_icons <list>
```

### SMARD energy data with ggplot2

``` r
library(ggplot2)

series <- smard_timeseries(410, region = "DE", resolution = "hour",
                           timestamp = 1627250400000)
series
#> # A tibble: 168 Ã— 3
#>        timestamp time                 value
#>            <dbl> <dttm>               <dbl>
#>  1 1627250400000 2021-07-26 00:00:00 42555 
#>  2 1627254000000 2021-07-26 01:00:00 41226.
#>  3 1627257600000 2021-07-26 02:00:00 40234.
#>  4 1627261200000 2021-07-26 03:00:00 40087.
#>  5 1627264800000 2021-07-26 04:00:00 42084.
#>  6 1627268400000 2021-07-26 05:00:00 45420.
#>  7 1627272000000 2021-07-26 06:00:00 52580.
#>  8 1627275600000 2021-07-26 07:00:00 58492.
#>  9 1627279200000 2021-07-26 08:00:00 62314 
#> 10 1627282800000 2021-07-26 09:00:00 63444 
#> # â„¹ 158 more rows

ggplot(series, aes(time, value)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(x = "Time", y = "MW", title = "Electricity generation")
```

![](reference/figures/README-smard-1.png)

`series$time` is a POSIXct column parsed in Europe/Berlin.

### DIP Bundestag parliamentary data (requires API key)

``` r
library(bunddev)

# List recent documents
docs <- dip_bundestag_drucksache_list(params = list(
  f.datum.start = "2025-01-01",
  f.drucksachetyp = "Gesetzentwurf"
))

# Get details for a specific document
dip_bundestag_drucksache(284229)

# Full text (includes text column)
dip_bundestag_drucksache_text(284229)
```

### Jobsuche (requires API key)

``` r
library(bunddev)

Sys.setenv(JOBBOERSE_API_KEY = "jobboerse-jobsuche")
bunddev_auth_set("jobsuche", type = "api_key", env_var = "JOBBOERSE_API_KEY")

jobs <- jobsuche_search(params = list(was = "data", size = 5), flatten = TRUE)
```

### Discover parameters from OpenAPI specs

``` r
bunddev_parameters("smard")
bunddev_parameter_values(smard_timeseries, "resolution")
```

## Related projects

| Language | Package     | Repository                                                        |
|----------|-------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Python   | deutschland | [bundesAPI/deutschland](https://github.com/bundesAPI/deutschland) |
| Perl     | WWW::Bund   | [Getty/p5-www-bund](https://github.com/Getty/p5-www-bund)         |

## Acknowledgements

This package builds on the work of the [bund.dev](https://bund.dev) team
and the [bundesAPI](https://github.com/bundesAPI) community, who curate
and document public sector APIs.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`abfallnavi_fraktionen()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/abfallnavi_fraktionen.md)
  : List waste fractions
- [`abfallnavi_fraktionen_hausnummern()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/abfallnavi_fraktionen_hausnummern.md)
  : List waste fractions for a house number
- [`abfallnavi_fraktionen_strassen()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/abfallnavi_fraktionen_strassen.md)
  : List waste fractions for a street
- [`abfallnavi_hausnummern()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/abfallnavi_hausnummern.md)
  : List house numbers for a street
- [`abfallnavi_kalender_download()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/abfallnavi_kalender_download.md)
  : Download calendar file
- [`abfallnavi_ort()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/abfallnavi_ort.md)
  : Get a place by id
- [`abfallnavi_orte()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/abfallnavi_orte.md)
  : List available places
- [`abfallnavi_strassen()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/abfallnavi_strassen.md)
  : List streets for a place
- [`abfallnavi_termine_hausnummern()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/abfallnavi_termine_hausnummern.md)
  : List collection dates for a house number
- [`abfallnavi_termine_strassen()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/abfallnavi_termine_strassen.md)
  : List collection dates for a street
- [`ausbildungssuche_details()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/ausbildungssuche_details.md)
  : Get training offer details
- [`ausbildungssuche_search()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/ausbildungssuche_search.md)
  : Search training offers
- [`autobahn_charging_station_details()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/autobahn_charging_station_details.md)
  : Get Autobahn charging station details
- [`autobahn_charging_stations()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/autobahn_charging_stations.md)
  : List Autobahn charging stations
- [`autobahn_closure_details()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/autobahn_closure_details.md)
  : Get Autobahn closure details
- [`autobahn_closures()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/autobahn_closures.md)
  : List Autobahn closures
- [`autobahn_parking_lorries()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/autobahn_parking_lorries.md)
  : List Autobahn lorry parking areas
- [`autobahn_parking_lorry_details()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/autobahn_parking_lorry_details.md)
  : Get Autobahn lorry parking details
- [`autobahn_roads()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/autobahn_roads.md)
  : List Autobahn road ids
- [`autobahn_roadwork_details()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/autobahn_roadwork_details.md)
  : Get Autobahn roadwork details
- [`autobahn_roadworks()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/autobahn_roadworks.md)
  : List Autobahn roadworks
- [`autobahn_warning_details()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/autobahn_warning_details.md)
  : Get Autobahn warning details
- [`autobahn_warnings()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/autobahn_warnings.md)
  : List Autobahn warnings
- [`autobahn_webcam_details()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/autobahn_webcam_details.md)
  : Get Autobahn webcam details
- [`autobahn_webcams()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/autobahn_webcams.md)
  : List Autobahn webcams
- [`bewerberboerse_details()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bewerberboerse_details.md)
  : Retrieve Bewerberboerse candidate details
- [`bewerberboerse_search()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bewerberboerse_search.md)
  : Search the Bewerberboerse API
- [`bunddev_auth_get()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_auth_get.md)
  : Get authentication configuration for an API
- [`bunddev_auth_set()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_auth_set.md)
  : Set authentication configuration for an API
- [`bunddev_cache_dir()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_cache_dir.md)
  : Locate the bunddev cache directory
- [`bunddev_call()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_call.md)
  : Call an API operation
- [`bunddev_call_tidy()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_call_tidy.md)
  : Call an API operation and return tidy data
- [`bunddev_endpoints()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_endpoints.md)
  : Retrieve endpoints for a given API
- [`bunddev_info()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_info.md)
  : Get a registry entry by id
- [`bunddev_list()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_list.md)
  : List registry entries
- [`bunddev_ms_to_posix()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_ms_to_posix.md)
  : Convert milliseconds to POSIXct
- [`bunddev_parameter_values()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_parameter_values.md)
  : Extract parameter enum values
- [`bunddev_parameters()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_parameters.md)
  : List OpenAPI parameters for an API
- [`bunddev_parameters_for()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_parameters_for.md)
  : List OpenAPI parameters for a specific adapter
- [`bunddev_rate_limit_get()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_rate_limit_get.md)
  : Get API rate limit configuration
- [`bunddev_rate_limit_set()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_rate_limit_set.md)
  : Set API rate limit configuration
- [`bunddev_registry()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_registry.md)
  : Read the bundled API registry
- [`bunddev_search()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_search.md)
  : Search registry entries
- [`bunddev_spec()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_spec.md)
  : Retrieve a cached API spec
- [`bunddev_spec_path()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_spec_path.md)
  : Build a cache path for an API spec
- [`bunddev_timestamp_to_ms()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bunddev_timestamp_to_ms.md)
  : Convert timestamps to milliseconds
- [`bundeshaushalt_budget_data()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundeshaushalt_budget_data.md)
  : Query Bundeshaushalt budget data
- [`bundesrat_aktuelles()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundesrat_aktuelles.md)
  : List current Bundesrat news
- [`bundesrat_mitglieder()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundesrat_mitglieder.md)
  : List Bundesrat members
- [`bundesrat_plenum_aktuelle_sitzung()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundesrat_plenum_aktuelle_sitzung.md)
  : List Bundesrat current plenum session entries
- [`bundesrat_plenum_chronologisch()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundesrat_plenum_chronologisch.md)
  : List Bundesrat plenum entries in chronological order
- [`bundesrat_plenum_kompakt()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundesrat_plenum_kompakt.md)
  : List Bundesrat plenum compact entries
- [`bundesrat_plenum_naechste_sitzungen()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundesrat_plenum_naechste_sitzungen.md)
  : Get Bundesrat upcoming plenum sessions
- [`bundesrat_praesidium()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundesrat_praesidium.md)
  : List Bundesrat presidium entries
- [`bundesrat_startlist()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundesrat_startlist.md)
  : List Bundesrat API endpoints
- [`bundesrat_stimmverteilung()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundesrat_stimmverteilung.md)
  : Get Bundesrat voting distribution
- [`bundesrat_termine()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundesrat_termine.md)
  : List Bundesrat dates and events
- [`bundestag_article()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundestag_article.md)
  : Get a Bundestag news article
- [`bundestag_ausschuesse()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundestag_ausschuesse.md)
  : List Bundestag committees
- [`bundestag_ausschuss()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundestag_ausschuss.md)
  : Get Bundestag committee details
- [`bundestag_conferences()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundestag_conferences.md)
  : Get Bundestag conferences overview
- [`bundestag_lobbyregister_search()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundestag_lobbyregister_search.md)
  : Search the Bundestag lobbyregister
- [`bundestag_mdb_bio()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundestag_mdb_bio.md)
  : Get a Bundestag biography
- [`bundestag_mdb_index()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundestag_mdb_index.md)
  : List Bundestag members of parliament
- [`bundestag_speaker()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundestag_speaker.md)
  : Get the current Bundestag speaker
- [`bundestag_video_feed()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/bundestag_video_feed.md)
  : Get a Bundestag video feed entry
- [`dashboard_deutschland_geo()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dashboard_deutschland_geo.md)
  : Get Dashboard Deutschland GeoJSON
- [`dashboard_deutschland_get()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dashboard_deutschland_get.md)
  : List Dashboard Deutschland entries
- [`dashboard_deutschland_indicators()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dashboard_deutschland_indicators.md)
  : Query Dashboard Deutschland indicators
- [`ddb_institution_sectors()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/ddb_institution_sectors.md)
  : List DDB institution sectors
- [`ddb_institutions()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/ddb_institutions.md)
  : List DDB institutions
- [`ddb_search()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/ddb_search.md) :
  Search Deutsche Digitale Bibliothek
- [`destatis_catalogue_cubes()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/destatis_catalogue_cubes.md)
  : List Destatis cubes
- [`destatis_catalogue_tables()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/destatis_catalogue_tables.md)
  : List Destatis tables
- [`destatis_data_cube()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/destatis_data_cube.md)
  : Retrieve Destatis cube data
- [`destatis_data_table()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/destatis_data_table.md)
  : Retrieve Destatis table data
- [`deutschlandatlas_query()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/deutschlandatlas_query.md)
  : Query Deutschlandatlas indicators
- [`diga_catalog_entries()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/diga_catalog_entries.md)
  : List DiGA catalog entries
- [`diga_charge_item_definitions()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/diga_charge_item_definitions.md)
  : List DiGA prescription units
- [`diga_device_definitions()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/diga_device_definitions.md)
  : List DiGA device definitions
- [`diga_organizations()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/diga_organizations.md)
  : List DiGA manufacturers
- [`diga_questionnaire_responses()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/diga_questionnaire_responses.md)
  : List DiGA questionnaire responses
- [`diga_questionnaires()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/diga_questionnaires.md)
  : List DiGA questionnaires
- [`dip_bundestag_aktivitaet()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_aktivitaet.md)
  : Get a DIP AktivitÃ¤t
- [`dip_bundestag_aktivitaet_list()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_aktivitaet_list.md)
  : List DIP AktivitÃ¤ten
- [`dip_bundestag_drucksache()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_drucksache.md)
  : Get a DIP Drucksache
- [`dip_bundestag_drucksache_list()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_drucksache_list.md)
  : List DIP Drucksachen
- [`dip_bundestag_drucksache_text()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_drucksache_text.md)
  : Get a DIP Drucksache text
- [`dip_bundestag_drucksache_text_list()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_drucksache_text_list.md)
  : List DIP Drucksache texts
- [`dip_bundestag_person()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_person.md)
  : Get a DIP Person
- [`dip_bundestag_person_list()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_person_list.md)
  : List DIP Personen
- [`dip_bundestag_plenarprotokoll()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_plenarprotokoll.md)
  : Get a DIP Plenarprotokoll
- [`dip_bundestag_plenarprotokoll_list()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_plenarprotokoll_list.md)
  : List DIP Plenarprotokolle
- [`dip_bundestag_plenarprotokoll_text()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_plenarprotokoll_text.md)
  : Get a DIP Plenarprotokoll text
- [`dip_bundestag_plenarprotokoll_text_list()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_plenarprotokoll_text_list.md)
  : List DIP Plenarprotokoll texts
- [`dip_bundestag_vorgang()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_vorgang.md)
  : Get a DIP Vorgang
- [`dip_bundestag_vorgang_list()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_vorgang_list.md)
  : List DIP Vorgang entries
- [`dip_bundestag_vorgangsposition()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_vorgangsposition.md)
  : Get a DIP Vorgangsposition
- [`dip_bundestag_vorgangsposition_list()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dip_bundestag_vorgangsposition_list.md)
  : List DIP Vorgangsposition entries
- [`dwd_alpine_forecast_text()`](https://buecker.ms/bunddev/reference/dwd_alpine_forecast_text.md)
  : Fetch DWD alpine forecast text

  : Fetch DWD coastal warnings

  : Fetch DWD crowd reports

  : Fetch DWD municipality warnings

  : Fetch DWD sea warning text

  : Fetch DWD station overview data

  : Fetch DWD nowcast warnings

  : Get Eco-Visio counter measurement data
